short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimalist new tab with quick access to bookmarks and most visited pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Heim is a simple new tab with productivity in mind. 

You want quick access to your most visited pages? You got it.
You need to reopen those closed tabs quickly? Yes.
Simple and elegant bookmark and device browser? Absolutely!

Gather your most important places under "Favorites", and you will never have to type in an address again.

Heim is Open Source.
You can contribute to development at https://github.com/kortemy/heim.
